title: Historical Price-to-Book (P/B) Ratio Trends of Pineapple Energy Inc Stock

content.text: The Price-to-Book (P/B) ratio is a financial metric used to evaluate a company's market value relative to its book value. It is calculated by dividing the market price per share by the book value per share. The P/B ratio reflects investor sentiment towards a company's growth potential and the profitability of its assets.
